definition: It's hard to clap with only one hand./It takes two to tango/It's difficult to achieve anything without support.
palm of the hand/sole of the foot/paw/horseshoe/to slap/to hold in one's hand/to wield
to cry (of birds, animals and insects)/to make a sound/to voice (one's gratitude, grievance etc)

sentences.english: A peaceful future is possible only with two states, not just the one.
sentences.chinese: 但是孤掌難鳴，只有巴以雙方共同努力才能實現和平。

sentences.english: Zilong was helpless. With Ah Dou in his arms, how could he shift the boat toward shore?
sentences.chinese: 趙雲孤掌難鳴，只護得阿斗，安能移舟傍岸。
